title: Delaney's Decision
description: There’s only one downside to hiring charming redhead Delaney as my new event coordinator… It means I can’t date her.After a chance meeting, I employ Delaney to work for my hotel. She’s amazing at her job - but I don’t care about that, because all I can think about is owning the girl.I can’t resist for long, and we start sleeping together in secret… but it seems like Delaney is keeping a big secret from me.When I find out a shocking fact about Delaney’s past, it all starts to make sense. But with the world against us, I don’t know how to make it work between us.All I know is I have to make things right - before the secret pregnancy she’s been hiding from me gives us the baby I’ve always wanted.Delaney’s Decision is a full-length standalone dark mafia romance, part of the Mafia Heirs Gallaghers series. All books can be enjoyed as standalones.
author: Raven  Scott
